# [Overview](..%2F..%2F..%2Fdocs%2Foverview%2FOverview.md) / sky browser

```sh
sky browser dev [app-name] --port 3000 --open

```

```sh
sky browser build [app-name]

```

```sh
sky browser start [app-name] --port 3000 --open
```
